dialogue.line: This is the central control terminal. I wonder if the tenderer uses it or if its remote controlled.
Seems the %%VTfirst freight capsule on the left side%% is damaged.
To: itv042@crx.com - From: cain@crx-logistic.com %n Subject: RE: Meteroid Impact Emergency %n Summary: asset significance low - %%VTEmployee life insurance bond found%% - record loss and continue

To: cain@crx-logistic.com - From: itv042@crx.com %n Subject: Meteroid Impact Emergency %n We got hit by a meteroid, no injured, cargo capsule 1 damaged, %%VThuman resources asset loss imminent%%, awaiting instruction.
Hull break detected cargo capsule 1; %n Main system shut down according to protocol; %n Cargo capsule 1: Decreasing atmosphere; temperature %n %%RDWarning Cargo capsule 1%% Atmosphere critical;
